name: oninhaus

body.origin:
|- wceq(cin(con0, cha), cpr(c1o, c2o))
-| wss(cin(con0, cha), cpr(c1o, c2o))
-| wss(cpr(c1o, c2o), cin(con0, cha))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cin(con0, cha), cpr(c1o, c2o))
-| wss(cin(con0, cha), cpr(c1o, c2o))
-| wss(cpr(c1o, c2o), cin(con0, cha))

stmt.origin: sseqtri(cin(con0, cha), cpr(c1o, c2o), cin(con0, ct1))

body.origin:
|- wss(cin(con0, cha), cpr(c1o, c2o))
-| wss(cin(con0, cha), cin(con0, ct1))
-| wceq(cin(con0, ct1), cpr(c1o, c2o))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cin(con0, cha), cpr(c1o, c2o))
-| wss(cpr(c1o, c2o), cin(con0, cha))
-| wss(cin(con0, cha), cin(con0, ct1))
-| wceq(cin(con0, ct1), cpr(c1o, c2o))

stmt.origin: ax-mp(wss(cin(con0, cha), cin(con0, ct1)), wss(cha, ct1))

body.origin:
|- wss(cin(con0, cha), cin(con0, ct1))
-| wss(cha, ct1)
-| wi(wss(cha, ct1), wss(cin(con0, cha), cin(con0, ct1)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (On ⋂ Haus)⊆(On ⋂ Fre)
⊣ Haus ⊆ Fre
⊣ (Haus ⊆ Fre →(On ⋂ Haus)⊆(On ⋂ Fre))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cin(con0, cha), cpr(c1o, c2o))
-| wss(cpr(c1o, c2o), cin(con0, cha))
-| wceq(cin(con0, ct1), cpr(c1o, c2o))
-| wss(cha, ct1)
-| wi(wss(cha, ct1), wss(cin(con0, cha), cin(con0, ct1)))

body.origin:
|- wss(cha, ct1)
-| wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cha), wcel(cv(hs0), ct1))
-| diffsc(hs0, cha)
-| diffsc(hs0, ct1)
body.pretty:
⊢ Haus ⊆ Fre
⊣ (hs0 ∈ Haus → hs0 ∈ Fre)
⊣ d(hs0, Haus)
⊣ d(hs0, Fre)

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cin(con0, cha), cpr(c1o, c2o))
-| wss(cpr(c1o, c2o), cin(con0, cha))
-| wceq(cin(con0, ct1), cpr(c1o, c2o))
-| wi(wss(cha, ct1), wss(cin(con0, cha), cin(con0, ct1)))
-| wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cha), wcel(cv(hs0), ct1))
-| diffsc(hs0, cha)
-| diffsc(hs0, ct1)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (On ⋂ Haus)= { 1o, 2o }
⊣ { 1o, 2o } ⊆(On ⋂ Haus)
⊣ (On ⋂ Fre)= { 1o, 2o }
⊣ (Haus ⊆ Fre →(On ⋂ Haus)⊆(On ⋂ Fre))
⊣ (hs0 ∈ Haus → hs0 ∈ Fre)
⊣ d(hs0, Haus)
⊣ d(hs0, Fre)

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cin(con0, cha), cpr(c1o, c2o))
-| wss(cpr(c1o, c2o), cin(con0, cha))
-| wceq(cin(con0, ct1), cpr(c1o, c2o))
-| wi(wss(cha, ct1), wss(cin(con0, cha), cin(con0, ct1)))
-| diffsc(hs0, cha)
-| diffsc(hs0, ct1)

body.origin: |- wi(wss(cha, ct1), wss(cin(con0, cha), cin(con0, ct1)))

-| diffsc(hs0, cha)

|- wceq(cin(con0, cha), cpr(c1o, c2o))
-| wss(cpr(c1o, c2o), cin(con0, cha))
-| diffsc(hs0, cha)
-| diffsc(hs0, ct1)
cumulated.pretty:

⊣ d(hs0, Fre)

cumulated.origin:

comment: The ordinal Hausdorff spaces are ` 1o ` and ` 2o ` . (Contributed by Chen-Pang He, 10-Nov-2015.)
